com.rakuten.android.ads.rps

Class AdStateListener

  • com.rakuten.android.ads.rps.AdStateListener

  • public class AdStateListener

    A listener for receiving notifications during the lifecycle of an ad.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdStateListener

        public AdStateListener()

        A listener for receiving notifications during the lifecycle of an ad.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoadSuccess

        public void onLoadSuccess()

        Called when an ad is received.

        It is called this method, if it is loaded an advertise successfully.

      • onLoadFailure

        public void onLoadFailure(@Nullable
                          android.view.View view)

        Called when an ad request failed.

        It is called this method, in case of loaded an advertise failure.

        And if it failed, AdView will be hidden(View.INVISIBLE) automatically.

        Parameters:
        view - target view

      • onClick

        public void onClick(@Nullable
                    android.view.View view)

        Called when a click is recorded for an ad.

        It is called this method, if it is clicked an advertise.

        (e.g. You use this method in case of to detect that clicked ad.)

        Parameters:
        view - target view

      • onLeftApplication

        public void onLeftApplication()

        Called when an ad leaves an application

        This method is called after onClick() when a user click opens browser(transition to ad's destination URL).

        ex. launched browser, launched other app.

      • onAdClosed

        public void onAdClosed()

        Called when return to an application from Ad page.

        When a user returns to the app after viewing an ad's destination URL, this method is called.
